main event: Witnesses observed three ground lights near Creswell Airport in Oregon on March 24, 1967, for a duration of about 10 minutes.
interesting points: The object had three lights, red, white, and green, and emitted a brightness comparable to a high-intensity city light,The lights were observed to be stationary before moving away quickly,The witness reported the lights landed in front of the airport,The observation took place at 7:45 PM,The witnesses included Errol Pratchard and one other individual, who both noted the peculiar movement and brightness of the lights.
sighted object: three ground lights with red, white, and green colors
witness description: Witnesses included Errol Pratchard and one additional individual, both stated they had not seen a similar object before.
